message:
Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this valuable asset at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special offer tailored to your needs and represents a significant value proposition compared to its market worth of $800,000.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am confident that this investment will provide substantial returns for your company. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
Alice
